mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM OA_USERDEF t WHERE 1=1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OA_USERDEF( id, account_id, name, copyto, approver, wkey, wname, pId, createTime, updateTime, attach ) VALUES ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{copyto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{attach,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM OA_USERDEF WHERE 1=1 AND id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE OA_USERDEF SET account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, copyto = #{copyto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, approver = #{approver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wkey = #{wkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wname = #{wname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pId = #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, attach = #{attach,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} WHERE id=#{id}
